pages.text: Medium-sized mammals that clean their food thoroughly before eating it.$(br2)$(bold)Health: $()7 Hearts$(br)$(bold)Attack-Damage: $()1.5 Hearts$(br2)$(bold)Breeding Items: $()$(br)$(li)Wheat$(li)Apple$(li)Carrot$(li)Potato$(li)Beetroot
